prompt: Create a vibrant fantasy art illustration of a common cosmic beast named 'Starflitter' within the Celestial Empires theme. The scene should depict a whimsical, starry night sky with small, glowing cosmic creatures that resemble butterflies. These 'Starflitters' should have delicate, translucent wings with sparkling star patterns and luminescent bodies, floating around iridescent, nebula-like clouds. The background should include a mix of twinkling stars and distant celestial bodies to give a sense of the vastness of space. Avoid any text in the image.
